name: EpicMafia role icons
additional_info:
Epicmafia community along with the admin came up with a bunch of new roles, which includes a bunch of new icons. Some of them need an upgrade.

UPDATE 2
Rearranged the https://epicmafia.com/images/roleimg.png


UPDATE 1

Changes to the https://epicmafia.com/images/roleimg.png :

Redrawn:
Mummy, Necromancer, Medium, Rainmaker, Queen Bee, Vengeful Spirit, Suspect, Whistleblower, Gunslinger, Sharpshooter,  
and Polar Bear (by Monobear),

Updated:
Arms Dealer, Clown, Poltergeist, Ghost, Ghostbuster, Snow Queen, Troublemaker, Phantom, Soldier, Jailkeep, Invisible man, Exorcist, Psychic


+other small changes like recolors
